bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers and Step-Voltage Regulators
Redline
IEEE Standard Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers and Step-Voltage Regulators - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.12.35-2013 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.35-2007) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Bar code label requirements for specific types of distribution transformers and step-voltage regulators are covered in this standard. Data content for temporary and permanent bar-code labeling is described as well as bar-code label print quality and durability requirements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.12.35-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.12.35-1996)
